verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

נָשֹׂ֗א <WH5375> na-So, Take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> roSh the sum בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons קְהָ֔ת <WH6955> ke-Hat, of Kohath מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3881> le-Vi; Leviite לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam. of their fathers

מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> mib-Ben old שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim From thirty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> va-Ma'-lah, and upward וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim even until fifty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בָּא֙ <WH935> ba all that enter לַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> latz-tza-Va, into the host לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to do מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> me-la-Chah the work בְּאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

זֹ֛את <WH2063> zot likewise עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dat This [shall be] the service בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the sons קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> ke-Hat of Kohath בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh [about] the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> hak-ko-da-Shim. holy things

וּבָ֨א <WH935> u-Va shall come אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> u-va-Nav and his sons בִּנְסֹ֣עַ <WH5265> bin-So-a' setteth forward הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh, And when the camp וְהוֹרִ֕דוּ <WH3381> ve-ho-Ri-du and they shall take down אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et פָּרֹ֣כֶת <WH6532> pa-Ro-chet vail הַמָּסָ֑ךְ <WH4539> ham-ma-Sach; the covering וְכִ֨סּוּ־ <WH3680> ve-Chis-su- and cover בָ֔הּ Vah, אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et אֲרֹ֥ן <WH727> 'a-Ron the ark הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut. of testimony

וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al Over שֻׁלְחַ֣ן <WH7979> shul-Chan And upon the table הַפָּנִ֗ים <WH6440> hap-pa-Nim, of shewbread יִפְרְשׂוּ֮ <WH6566> yif-re-Su they shall spread בֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> Be-ged a cloth תְּכֵלֶת֒ <WH8504> te-che-Let of blue וְנָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> ve-na-te-Nu and put עָ֠לָיו <WH5921> 'A-lav Over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקְּעָרֹ֤ת <WH7086> hak-ke-'a-Rot thereon the dishes וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַכַּפֹּת֙ <WH3709> hak-kap-Pot and the spoons וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמְּנַקִּיֹּ֔ת <WH4518> ham-me-nak-ki-Yot, and the bowls וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et קְשׂ֣וֹת <WH7184> ke-Sot and covers הַנָּ֑סֶךְ <WH5262> han-Na-sech; to cover withal וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> ve-Le-chem bread הַתָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid and the continual עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav Over יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> yih-Yeh. become

וְלָקְח֣וּ׀ <WH3947> ve-la-ke-Chu And they shall take בֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> Be-ged a cloth תְּכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let, of blue וְכִסּ֞וּ <WH3680> ve-chis-Su and cover אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְנֹרַ֤ת <WH4501> me-no-Rat the candlestick הַמָּאוֹר֙ <WH3974> ham-ma-'Or of the light וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נֵ֣רֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH5216> ne-ro-Tei-ha, and his lamps וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַלְקָחֶ֖יהָ <WH4457> mal-ka-Chei-ha and his tongs וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַחְתֹּתֶ֑יהָ <WH4289> mach-to-Tei-ha; and his snuffdishes וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> ke-Lei vessels שַׁמְנָ֔הּ <WH8081> sham-Nah, and all the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יְשָׁרְתוּ־ <WH8334> ye-sha-re-tu- thereof wherewith they minister לָ֖הּ lah בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וְנָתְנ֤וּ <WH5414> ve-na-te-Nu And they shall put אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> 'o-Tah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all כֵּלֶ֔יהָ <WH3627> ke-Lei-ha, it and all the vessels אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in מִכְסֵ֖ה <WH4372> mich-Seh thereof within a covering ע֣וֹר <WH5785> or skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <WH8476> Ta-chash; of badgers' וְנָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> ve-na-te-Nu and shall put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4132> ham-Mot.
